data.headline: Experienced Backend Engineer with a Passion for Innovative Startups
data.summary: Seasoned backend engineer with a proven track record of delivering high-impact projects for fast-growing startups. Skilled in designing scalable, reliable, and efficient systems that drive business growth.

experience.title: Backend Lead
bullets: Designed and implemented a scalable microservices architecture, reducing infrastructure costs by 25% and improving system reliability by 30%.
Spearheaded the migration to a containerized deployment using Docker and Kubernetes, improving deployment time by 50% and reducing downtime.
Collaborated with the product team to develop innovative features that increased user engagement by 40% and drove a 25% increase in revenue.
Mentored and trained a team of 5 junior engineers, helping them develop their skills and contributing to a 20% improvement in team productivity.

experience.title: Backend Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained backend systems for 10+ startups, contributing to their successful launches and growth.
Implemented scalable and secure data pipelines, reducing processing time by 40% and improving data reliability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and address technical challenges, leading to a 30% improvement in project delivery timelines.
Provided technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers, helping them improve their skills and become more productive.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained backend systems for clients in various industries, including e-commerce, healthcare, and finance.
Implemented efficient data processing pipelines, resulting in a 20% reduction in operational costs for clients.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and address technical debt, leading to a 15% improvement in system performance.
Provided technical support and training to client teams, helping them become more self-sufficient and reducing the need for ongoing support.

experience.title: Junior Backend Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained backend systems for the university's administrative and student-facing applications.
Participated in the implementation of a new content management system, resulting in a 25% increase in website traffic and a 20% reduction in content management workload.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and address technical issues, leading to a 10% improvement in system uptime.
Provided technical support and training to university staff, helping them become more self-sufficient and reducing the need for ongoing support.

projects.name: Fintech Startup Backend System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable and reliable backend system for a fast-growing fintech startup, including features such as secure user authentication, transaction processing, and data analytics.

projects.name: University CMS Integration
projects.description: Developed and integrated a new content management system for the university's website, improving content management workflows and increasing website traffic by 25%.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Javier Gutiérrez, a mid-career backend engineer with a passion for innovative startups.
